website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, compact yet powerful home slicer that is suitable for meats and cheeses.
pros: This stainless steel slicer features an impressive 200-watt motor for professional quality slicing at home
The removable blade and food carriage allow for easy cleaning
cons: You may need to rotate the meat occasionally so you don't end up with a wedge

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and power
customer_reviews.text: I know in this price point quality gets left out. I had a quisinart slicer I purchased at a local place. I took it back. I then ordered this. I received this and used it immediately. Cleaned it very well. Easy to clean. Blade comes out easy. I sliced turkey really nicely. Great power for how little.. also sliced Genoa salami. It was no problem. Very good slicer for the buck. Hope it last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Danelli

customer_reviews.title: Happy except for online registration bump
customer_reviews.text: Husband is quite happy with his new toy so far. Service was also very good. My only issue is Ive been trying to register it online but I haven’t ever received the email it said it was going to send me.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great meat slicer for the pricee
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works well. If slicing semi frozen meat for jerky do not push the meat to hard against the plate it will cause it to cut thicker slices.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to slice meat for jerky. That's all I've used it for so far and it's great for that. I'd 100% recommend it for light, home use. Comes apart easily for cleaning. The suction is really tight. Takes an effort to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very easy to clean. Not too big and fits on counter top. Only used it for cheese so far. Made nice thin slices.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dudley Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like the suctioncups on the corners.
customer_reviews.text: Received, opened box, took out of boxes, removed tape on blade, washed unit, dried, used to slice home made bread. Opened to widest setting would have hoped for larger opening for bread and to slice Ham Steaks. Other then the width of opening unit looks and handles well. Will work well for cold cut meats. Will try cutting cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Vicars

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I bought it to be able to slice meat as thin as I want. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sissie

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once and it works just fine. It’s fairly easy to clean. I’m satisfied with this slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Walking backwards

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Slicer!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting this meat slicer. I previously used OSTBA meat slicer and this one works as good. Clean is not hard but the bottom of the blade is a little hard to clean as others mentioned. I have used this twice already to slice meat very thin for hot pot. The sliced meat was thin and cutting was easy even blade rotates slightly slower tan I expected. I can already tell how much money I will save this winter by slicing my own meat for hot pot. Great slicer!! I am definitely a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: MOINUL AFSER

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the dollar.....
customer_reviews.text: We have used the slicer to slice lunch meat, cheese and tomatoes. We just used it to slice venison for jerky and so far it has preformed pretty well. Just have to remember it is not a commercial unit so don't push it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Slices very thin or can be larger. Easy to clean. Durable. We'll built
customer_reviews.author: jean puckett

customer_reviews.title: slicing machine
customer_reviews.text: Used the slicer 4 times and it works great. Cut hard salami and other things and so far I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Magliano

customer_reviews.title: Broke upon first use
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is useless. They do not respond to THEIR email request info system. They state 48-72 hours. I have waited more than 10 days - no response. Tried calling customer service. Stayed on the line - they disconnect. BUY SOMETHING ELSE IF YOU WANT TO ACTUALLY USE A FOOD SLICER. The piece that broke after 5 minutes is poorly constructed. A total waste of money!!! All I requested from their service is how and where to purchase a replacement part. They do not even respond.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dries

customer_reviews.title: Very capable for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and performs well. Hard enough to clean that it's not worth cleaning for a few cuts, only for longer jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality meat slicer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made professional meat slicer. It cuts meat pretty well for me since I noticed it spins the blade faster and the tray slides/glides more smoothly compared to other meat slicers that I tried in the same price range. One dislike is the short power cord, just add 2-3 feet more and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kobe doug

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A PIECE OF JUNK!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk. I have had mine for 5 years and it sucks. Don't waste your time and money. Save your money for a better one. It is all plastic. Don't believe them when they say that it can cut frozen meat. Also when you cut meat it does not slice the whole piece of meat .
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Bornstein

product_meta.title: Kalorik 200 W Professional Food Slicer, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverBring deli-quality slicing into your kitchen with the Kalorik Professional Food Slicer. Effortlessly slice cheese, meat, bread, vegetables and more with the sharp 7.5-inch serrated stainless steel blade. The powerful 200W motor allows for continuous and precise slicing. Adjust slices from deli-thin to 1/2-inch thick for uniform cutting. Whether you are making cheese boards or preparing sandwiches, the Kalorik Professional Food Slicer will deliver delicatessen cuts every time.
feature_bullets: 7.5” stainless-steel serrated blade and Powerful 200W motor.
Cutting width: up to 6.7" and Thickness adjustment: 0-0.6" (15mm).
Complete Metallic Body and Removable blade & food carriage for easy cleaning.
Non-slip suction feet for stability and Safety pusher and thumb guard.
Manufacturers warranty when purchased through Kalorik.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
